mapper.select: select T.id, T.name, T.gender, T.age, concat(#{path},T.image_url) imageUrl, group_concat(S.id) subjectId, group_concat(S.name) subjectName from teacher T left join teacher_subject TS on T.id = TS.teacher_id left join subject S on S.id = TS.subject_id where T.name like CONCAT('%',#{name},'%') group by T.id order by T.id desc

select T.id, T.name, T.gender, T.age, concat(#{path},T.image_url) imageUrl, group_concat(S.id) subjectId, group_concat(S.name) subjectName from teacher T left join teacher_subject TS on T.id = TS.teacher_id left join subject S on S.id = TS.subject_id where T.id = #{id}
